sentence.Network_en: But Egypt was then already a conquered country under an Ethiopian dynasty.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过,那个时候的埃及已经是埃塞俄比亚王朝统治下的一个战败国.

sentence.Network_en: Are Ethiopian men allowed to marry whites?
sentence.Network_cn: 埃塞俄比亚男人可以娶白种女人 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: She then adopted her daughter Zahara, an Ethiopian orphan, in 2005.
sentence.Network_cn: 2005年,她又收养了一个埃塞俄比亚孤儿, 也就是她的养女扎哈拉.

entry.def: Ethiopian means belonging or relating to Ethiopia, or to its people, language, or culture.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Ethiopia
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Ethiopia or its people or languages;
